valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low west of Shannon 998 expected southeast Bailey 996 by midday tomorrow. New low expected Faeroes 998 by same time. Low Fair Isle 991 losing its identity
